Privacy Policy for HackerFeed

Last updated: July 20, 2025

1. Data Controller

This application is developed by Vishnuprasad Kamalon. For any privacy-related questions, please contact: vishnuprasad.kamalon@gmail.com

2. Data We Collect

HackerFeed is designed with privacy in mind. We don't collect any data:

  • No Personal Data: We do not collect any personal information such as names, email addresses, or phone numbers.
  • No User Accounts: The app does not require registration or user accounts.
  • Local Data Only: All your preferences and favorites are stored locally on your device.

3. Data Usage

  • News Content: We fetch news articles from Hacker News API for display purposes only.
  • Favorites: Articles you mark as favorites are stored locally on your device.
  • Cache: Article content is temporarily cached on your device to improve performance.

4. Data Sharing

We do not share any data with third parties. All data remains on your device.

5. Data Retention

All data is stored locally on your device. You can clear this data at any time through the app\'s cache management feature or by uninstalling the app.

6. Your Rights

Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have full control over your data:

  • Access: You can view all your favorites and cached content
  • Deletion: You can clear cache and remove favorites at any time
  • Portability: Your data remains on your device

7. Security

Your data is protected by your device\'s security measures. We recommend keeping your device secure with appropriate lock screens and security updates.

8. Changes to Privacy Policy

Any changes to this privacy policy will be reflected in app updates. The current version is always available in the app settings.

Terms and Conditions for HackerFeed

Last updated: July 20, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using HackerFeed, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use this application.

2. Description of Service

HackerFeed is a news reader application that displays articles from Hacker News. It allows you to:

  • Browse and read news articles
  • Save articles as favorites locally
  • Manage cached content

3. User Responsibilities

  • Use the app in compliance with applicable laws
  • Respect intellectual property rights of article authors
  • Use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes

4. Content

All article content is sourced from Hacker News and is subject to their terms of service. We do not own or control the content of articles displayed.

5. Limitations

  • The app is provided "as is" without warranties
  • We are not responsible for the accuracy of third-party content
  • Service availability may vary based on internet connectivity

6. Privacy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy for information about how we handle data.

7. Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updates will be reflected in new app versions.

8. Contact

For questions about these terms, please contact: vishnuprasad.kamalon@gmail.com

Data Protection Information

Your Rights Under GDPR

1. Right to Information

You have the right to know what data is processed. HackerFeed processes minimal data:

  • Article favorites (stored locally)
  • Cache data (stored locally)
  • No personal identifiers

2. Right of Access

You can access all your data through the app interface:

  • View your favorites in the Favorites section
  • Manage cache through Cache Management

3. Right to Deletion

You can delete your data at any time:

  • Remove individual favorites
  • Clear all cache data
  • Uninstall the app to remove all data

4. Right to Rectification

Since we don\'t store personal data, rectification is not applicable. You can manage favorites as needed.

5. Right to Data Portability

All data remains on your device and is not transmitted to external servers.

6. Right to Object

You can stop using the app at any time. No ongoing data processing occurs without your active use.

7. Data Processing Legal Basis

Data processing is based on:

  • Legitimate interest: Providing news reading functionality
  • User consent: Saving favorites and cache for better experience

8. Data Security

Your data is protected by:

  • Local storage only (no cloud transmission)
  • Device-level security measures
  • No collection of sensitive personal data

9. Contact for Data Protection

For any data protection concerns, contact: vishnuprasad.kamalon@gmail.com
